Key Match Events: GRAND SLAM HOME RUN! Dodgers 2-5 Yankees, bottom 3rd
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees keep World Series alive as bats awaken for Game 4 win over Dodgers
New York are the first team since 1970 to extend a World Series to a fifth game when down three games to none.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yankees shortstop Anthony Volpe hits a grand slam against the Dodgers in the third inning during Game 4 of the World Series.
Austin Wells adds on with a key home run in the sixth inning.
Dodgers' pitcher Luke Weaver gets a crucial out against Mookie Betts in the seventh inning.
